mapper.select: SELECT galleryno, gallery_category_no, admin_no, gallery_title, gallery_date, gallery_hit FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, galleryno, gallery_category_no, admin_no, gallery_title, gallery_date, gallery_hit FROM (SELECT galleryno, gallery_category_no, admin_no, gallery_title, gallery_date, gallery_hit FROM gallery ORDER BY galleryno desc) WHERE ROWNUM <=#{endNo}) WHERE RN >=#{startNo}
